Headline: X49 Western Express & #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/Harrison
ShortDescription: Southbound X49 Western Express & 49 Western buses are temp rrtd via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk, and Western, due to street blockage near Western/Harrison

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound X49 Western Express & #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Harrison, Oakley, Polk, and Western, then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Western/Harrison.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red  Line Service Delayed at Harrison
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are standing at Harrison due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are standing at Harrison due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
